pkgmetadata.longdescription: Climate Crop Zoning Based in Air Temperature for Brazil // Climate crop zoning based in minimum and maximum air temperature. The data used in the package are from 'TerraClimate' dataset (https://www.climatologylab.org/terraclimate.html), but, it have been calibrated with automatic weather stations of National Meteorological Institute of Brazil. The climate crop zoning of this package can be run for all the Brazilian territory.
